entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this morning. Periods of rain or snow beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
